@graph.name: Equipment & Cargo Overview - Btracking
@graph.description: Track tools and equipment, keep tabs on cargo, monitor temperature and humidity. Monitor and remotely unlock cargo doors.
@graph.keywords: equipment tracking, cargo tracking, tool tracking, temperature monitoring, humidity monitoring, remote door unlock, pallet tracking, package tracking, cold chain monitoring

@graph.name: Equipment & Cargo Tracking Solutions
@graph.description: Btracking's solutions for tools, equipment, and cargo. Track assets with BLE and GPS, monitor temperature and humidity for cold chain, and remotely unlock cargo doors.

itemOffered.name: Tool Tracking
itemOffered.description: Integrate BLE tags into GPS trackers to monitor tool inventory on vehicles and in your shop, with pickup/dropoff alerts.

itemOffered.name: Equipment Tracking
itemOffered.description: Prevent equipment loss and reduce theft by tracking portable equipment, pallets, and packages from your phone or PC.

itemOffered.name: Pallet Tracking
itemOffered.description: Easily keep track of valuable pallets and their cargo with reusable trackers to prevent loss and quickly locate them in the yard.

itemOffered.name: Packages & Cargo Tracking
itemOffered.description: Prevent loss and theft with real GPS package and cargo tracking, using reusable trackers with long-life batteries.

itemOffered.name: Cold Chain Temperature & Humidity Monitoring
itemOffered.description: Monitor temperature and humidity inside trailers and containers with real-time GPS locations and alerts if thresholds are exceeded.

itemOffered.name: Remote Door Unlocking
itemOffered.description: Secure cargo with the Solar Elock, providing real-time GPS tracking, tampering alerts, and remote unlocking via app or SMS.

mainEntity.name: How do Btracking tool tracking devices work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Btracking uses BLE tags and GPS trackers to monitor tool locations. Tags beam a unique ID within 250 ft, and BLE-enabled GPS trackers in vehicles or warehouses transmit the tool’s location to your platform in real time.

mainEntity.name: What are equipment tracking devices and how do they work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Equipment tracking devices use GPS, BLE, WiFi, or LoRa technology to monitor the real-time location of assets. Btracking offers devices for tools, small equipment, pallets, and packages, allowing businesses to prevent theft, reduce loss, and track movement from phone or PC.

mainEntity.name: How does pallet tracking with GPS work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Pallet tracking is made simple with Btracking’s mini GPS equipment tracking devices. Once attached, trackers send real-time updates when in motion and switch to lower-frequency reporting when idle, extending battery life while ensuring visibility of your pallets.

mainEntity.name: How do our cold chain monitoring solutions work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Btracking’s cold chain monitoring solutions use GPS-enabled devices with internal or BLE-connected sensors to track temperature, humidity, and location. Real-time alerts notify drivers and managers of any deviations.

mainEntity.name: Can I track packages in transit with Btracking?

acceptedAnswer.text: Btracking’s package GPS tracking devices are designed to locate shipments even inside warehouses or boxes. Mini battery trackers provide real-time updates and can also monitor temperature during transport, making them perfect for sensitive shipments.
